title: Deion rips 'foolish' reports on Shedeur draft prep
description: Deion Sanders says he was "hurt" by reports that his son Shedeur Sanders was unprepared during predraft meetings with NFL teams, but he also isn't buying the validity of them, either.
author: ESPN

title: Lions' Pro Bowl center Ragnow says he's retiring
description: Lions center Frank Ragnow, a four-time Pro Bowl selection, announced his retirement on social media Monday.

title: Draper rues 'missed opportunity' after Bublik loss
description: Britain's Jack Draper is given a reality check as world number 62 Alexander Bublik produces a stunning performance to reach the French Open quarter-finals.

title: England to train in tents to replicate World Cup heat
description: England use heated tents as part of training to replicate the conditions they could experience at next year's World Cup.

title: 'Not right' - Verstappen accepts blame for Russell clash and apologises to Red Bull
description: Max Verstappen has admitted his controversial clash with George Russell at the Spanish Grand Prix was "not right" as Red Bull team principal Christian Horner revealed his driver apologised to the team.

title: Piastri beats Norris to pole as McLaren seal front-row lockout in Spain
description: Oscar Piastri beat team-mate Lando Norris to pole position for the Spanish Grand Prix as McLaren sealed a front-row lockout.

title: Mets' Sean Manaea's live bullpen 'went well,' could be nearing rehab assignment
description: Each day that goes by, Mets left-hander Sean Manaea gets closer and closer to returning to the team.
